messages.content: This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How can I reset my password?
You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and following the instructions sent to your email.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
What is your return policy?
Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase, given the product is in its original condition. For more details, please check our Return Policy page.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Do you offer international shipping?
Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by destination. For more information, please visit our Shipping Information page.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Can I change my order after placing it?
You can change your order within 24 hours of placement. Please contact our support team as soon as possible with your order number and desired changes.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
I received a faulty item, what should I do?
We're sorry to hear that. Please contact our customer service with your order number and a description of the fault. We will assist you with a replacement or refund.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How can I track my order?
Once your order has been shipped, you'll receive an email with a tracking number. You can use this number on our website to track your order's shipping status.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Are there any discounts for first-time customers?
Yes, first-time customers are eligible for a 10% discount on their first order. Please subscribe to our newsletter to receive your discount code.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How do I unsubscribe from emails?
You can unsubscribe by clicking the 'unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any of our emails. We're sorry to see you go!
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
What payment methods do you accept?
We accept various payment methods including Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
My order is late, what should I do?
If your order hasn't arrived by the estimated delivery date, please check the tracking information. If there's an issue, contact our customer service for assistance.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How do I create an account?
Creating an account is easy! Just click on the 'Sign Up' button on our homepage and follow the instructions.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Is my personal information secure with you?
Absolutely. We take your privacy seriously and ensure your personal information is secure. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more details.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
What should I do if I forget my login details?
If you've forgotten your login details, please use the 'Forgot Password' function on the login page, or contact our support team for assistance.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How long does shipping usually take?
Shipping times vary depending on your location and the shipping method selected. You can find estimated shipping times on our Shipping Information page.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Can I return a product I'm not satisfied with?
Certainly, if you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days for a refund or exchange. Please see our Return Policy for more details.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How do I apply a promo code to my order?
You can apply a promo code at checkout. There will be a box to enter the code before finalizing your purchase. If the code is valid, the discount will be applied to your order total.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Do you have a loyalty program?
Yes, we have a loyalty program for our valued customers. You can earn points with every purchase and redeem them for discounts on future orders. Check out our Loyalty Program page for more details.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
I received the wrong item. What do I do?
We apologize for the mistake. Please contact our customer service team with your order number, and we'll arrange for the correct item to be sent to you as quickly as possible.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How can I cancel my order?
Orders can be cancelled within 2 hours of placement. Please contact our customer support immediately with your order number to process a cancellation.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
What warranty comes with your products?
Our products come with a 1-year warranty covering manufacturing defects. For more information, please visit our Warranty Information page.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How often do you restock items?
We restock items regularly. If an item is out of stock, you can request to be notified when it's back in stock on the product page.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Do you offer gift wrapping services?
Yes, we offer gift wrapping services for a small fee. You can select this option at checkout.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Can I place an order over the phone?
Certainly! Please call our customer service team, and we'll be happy to assist you with placing your order over the phone.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
What are your customer service hours?
Our customer service team is available Monday through Friday, 9 am to 5 pm. We're here to help with any questions or concerns you may have.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How do I provide feedback about a product?
We love hearing from our customers! You can provide feedback on a product directly on the product page under the 'Reviews' section.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Are your products environmentally friendly?
We're committed to sustainability. Many of our products are made with environmentally friendly materials. You can find more details on our Sustainability page.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Do you have a physical store?
Yes, we have physical stores in select locations. Check our Store Locator page on our website for the nearest store to you.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How do I sign up for the newsletter?
You can sign up for our newsletter at the bottom of our homepage. Enter your email address and you'll be the first to know about new products, sales, and more.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
What are the benefits of creating an account?
Creating an account allows for a faster checkout process, order tracking, and access to exclusive offers. Sign up today to enjoy these benefits!
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Can I update my shipping address after placing an order?
Please contact our customer support as soon as possible to update your shipping address. We can make changes if your order hasn't been shipped yet.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
What's the process for reporting a lost package?
If your package is lost, please contact us immediately with your order number. We will investigate with the courier and resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Do you have any vegan products?
Yes, we offer a selection of vegan products. Please check our 'Vegan Products' category on the website for more information.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
How do I know if a product is in stock?
Product availability is shown on each product's page. If an item is out of stock, you can request an email notification for when it's back in stock.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Can I shop online and pick up in store?
Yes, we offer an in-store pickup option for online orders. Please select 'Pick Up In Store' at checkout and follow the instructions.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
What sizes are available for this product?
Product sizes are listed on each product page. If you're unsure about sizing, please refer to our sizing guide or contact customer support for assistance.

How can I get in touch with corporate sales?
For corporate sales inquiries, please visit our 'Corporate Sales' page for contact information and how to reach out to our team.

Do you offer bulk purchase discounts?
Yes, we offer discounts for bulk purchases. Please contact our sales team for more details and how to apply.

Is it safe to use my credit card on your site?
Absolutely, our website uses SSL encryption to ensure your credit card information is secure at all times. Your safety is our top priority.

What's your environmental policy?
We are committed to sustainability and reducing our environmental impact. You can learn more about our efforts and initiatives on our 'Environmental Policy' page.

Can I edit my review after submission?
Yes, you can edit your review after submission. Simply go to the product page where you submitted the review and you will see an option to edit it.

To delete your account, please contact customer support directly. We'll guide you through the process and ensure all your data is properly removed.

The maximum order quantity varies by product. For large orders, please contact our sales team for assistance.

To delete your account, please contact our support team with your request. We're sad to see you go!

Yes, our size guide is available on the product pages. It can help you find the perfect fit for our products.

Changes to the delivery method can be made within a few hours of order placement. Please contact our customer service immediately for assistance.

Yes, we offer express shipping options. You can select express shipping at checkout for an additional fee.

If you notice an error in your order confirmation, please contact our customer service as soon as possible to correct it.

Can I reserve an item that's out of stock?
We currently do not offer the option to reserve out-of-stock items. However, you can sign up for stock alerts on the product page.

We offer samples for select products. For availability, please check the product page or contact our customer service.

Stay informed about our sales and promotions by subscribing to our newsletter and following us on social media.

What's your policy on animal testing?
We are proud to say that we do not test our products on animals at any stage of product development. For more information, please visit our Animal Welfare Policy page.

To update your billing information, please go to your account settings and select 'Billing Information'. You can edit your details there.

What are the store hours?
Our store hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 8 PM, and Saturday to Sunday, 10 AM to 6 PM. Hours may vary on holidays.
This is a customer support chatbot designed to help with common inquiries for Kesha's Boutique.
Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied with my purchase?
Yes, if you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund, provided it meets our return policy conditions.

How do I contact customer service?
You can contact our customer service team via email at support@example.com, or by phone at 1-800-123-4567. We're here to help!

Do you have a catalog?
Yes, we have a digital catalog available on our website. You can also request a physical catalog by contacting our customer service.

We appreciate your feedback! You can leave a review on the product page for the item you purchased. Look for the 'Write a Review' button.

We do offer price matching under certain conditions. Please contact our customer service with the competitor's offer, and we'll assist you further.

What's the difference between shipping and billing address?
Your shipping address is where you'd like your order delivered, while the billing address should match the address on your payment method or account.

You can save items for later by adding them to your Wishlist. Just click the 'Add to Wishlist' button on the product page.

We accept several currencies for transactions, including USD, EUR, GBP, and CAD. You can select your preferred currency at the bottom of our website.

Yes, we offer an in-store pickup option for online orders. Please select 'Pick up in store' at checkout and choose your preferred store location.

If an item is missing from your order, please contact our customer service immediately with your order number and the missing item's details.

If you wish to change the color of an item you ordered, please contact our customer service as soon as possible. Changes depend on the item's availability.

Yes, we have a mobile app available for both iOS and Android devices. It's a great way to shop and stay connected with us.

Please provide your order number, and I'll check on the status of your refund. Typically, refunds take 5-10 business days to process.

Yes, you can purchase gift cards directly from our website. Visit our Gift Card section for more details and to choose your amount.
